install.name: YT Playlist
install.author: Paul English
install.description: Module to load a YouTube Player and Pageable Playlist into a page

param.name: playlistid
param.label: Playlist ID
param.description: The Playlist ID containing the playlist you wish to use

param.name: playlist-length
param.label: Playlist Item Count
param.description: Number of items to show in the playlist area

param.name: player-width
param.label: Player Width
param.description: Width of the youtube video player

param.name: player-height
param.label: Player Height
param.description: Height of the youtube video player
